title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Criminal Evidence Act 1992 (No. 12 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Evidence Act 1992 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Evidence Act 1992 (Section 

13) (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal evidence act 1992 (section 13) (commencement) order 2021

title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Criminal Evidence Act 1992 (No. 12 of
heading: 2. The 15th day of December 2021 is fixed as the day on which section 13
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of December 2021 is fixed as the day on which section 13 
of the Criminal Evidence Act 1992 (No. 12 of 1992) shall come into operation 
for – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

the District Court sitting in District No. 4, 

the District Court sitting in District No. 16, 

the District Court sitting in District No. 17, 

the District Court sitting in District No. 20, and 

the District Court sitting in District No. 21. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 December, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [693] 3
